Package com.mhealthatlas.taxonomy.command

Interface IAppCommandService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppCommandService
public interface IAppCommandService
Contains handler methods for events created by the Application service and methods to mutate application version taxonomy class mappings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deleteAppTaxonomyClass​(java.lang.Long appId, java.lang.Long classId)
    Deletes a application version class mapping.
    void handleChangedApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType)
    Handels a "[application type]_application_changed" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity.
    void handleChangedAppVersion​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appVersionData, AppType appType)
    Handels a "[application type]_application_version_changed" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity.
    void handleDeletedApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType)
    Handels a "[application type]_application_deleted" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppIdEventDto.
    void handleNewApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType)
    Handels a "[application type]_application_added" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity.
    void handleNewAppVersion​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appVersionData, AppType appType)
    Handels a "[application type]_application_version_added" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity.
    java.lang.Boolean postAppTaxonomyClass​(java.lang.Long appId, TaxonomyClassPostDto taxonomyClassPostDto)
    Creates a new application version taxonomy class mapping.

  • Method Details

    • postAppTaxonomyClass

      java.lang.Boolean postAppTaxonomyClass​(java.lang.Long appId, TaxonomyClassPostDto taxonomyClassPostDto)
      Creates a new application version taxonomy class mapping.
      Parameters:
      appId - the application version id
      taxonomyClassPostDto - the taxonomy class
      Returns:
      True, if the mapping was created successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • deleteAppTaxonomyClass

      java.lang.Boolean deleteAppTaxonomyClass​(java.lang.Long appId, java.lang.Long classId)
      Deletes a application version class mapping.
      Parameters:
      appId - the application version id
      classId - the taxonomy class id
      Returns:
      True, if the mapping was deleted successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • handleNewApp

      void handleNewApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application type]_application_added" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application data
      appType - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppEventDto.

    • handleChangedApp

      void handleChangedApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application type]_application_changed" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application data
      appType - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppEventDto.

    • handleNewAppVersion

      void handleNewAppVersion​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appVersionData, AppType appType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application type]_application_version_added" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appVersionData - the event application version data
      appType - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppEventDto.

    • handleChangedAppVersion

      void handleChangedAppVersion​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appVersionData, AppType appType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application type]_application_version_changed" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppEventDto and transformed in a AppVersion entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appVersionData - the event application version data
      appType - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppEventDto.

    • handleDeletedApp

      void handleDeletedApp​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType appType) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application type]_application_deleted" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppIdEventDto. Then the application is deleted using the AppIdEventDto.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application version data
      appType - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppIdEventDto.
